DOC.criteria: Infants 3 month age birth weight 2500 g and/or 36th week gestation . Further fulfil Wessel et al criterion infant colic : `` Paroxystic uncontrollable cry otherwise healthy child 3 month age , 3 hour cry per day 3 day week 3 week . '' Infants 3 month age birth weight 2500 g and/or 36th week gestation .
